properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM NOTICE WHERE STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT NOTICE_NO, M.MEM_ID MEM_ID, NOTICE_TITLE, ENR_DATE FROM NOTICE N JOIN MEMBER M ON ( N.MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO ) WHERE N.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY ENR_DATE DESC

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM( SELECT NOTICE_NO, M.MEM_ID MEM_ID, NOTICE_TITLE, ENR_DATE FROM NOTICE N JOIN MEMBER M ON ( N.MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO ) WHERE N.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY ENR_DATE DESC) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
